/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's view of the surroundings. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun is shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The road itself is divided by a median, and power lines stretch across the background, adding a touch of urbanity to the otherwise natural landscape. On the right side of the road, there are trees and shrubs, their green hues contrasting with the blue of the sky. In the distance, a bridge can be seen, perhaps leading to another part of the city. The image is taken from a low angle, making the viewer feel as if they are part of the journey, driving down the highway under the vast blue sky.
